title: Share analyzer between frontend and edge functions
description: Extract WCAG analyzer logic into a single Deno-compatible module and import it from both the frontend (via build) and the Supabase edge functions to prevent drift.

title: Unify contrast utilities
description: Create a shared contrast helper with comprehensive color parsing and reuse it across browser and edge environments.

title: Standardize edge function responses and iteration management
description: Update process-upload and refine-code to return consistent payloads and perform atomic iteration inserts with database safety.

title: Add server-side file validation
description: Ensure edge functions validate file types and sizes to complement frontend checks.

title: Implement CSS stylesheet parsing for contrast checks
description: Enhance WCAG analyzer to parse linked stylesheets and class-based colors for accurate contrast evaluation.

title: Create analyzer test harness
description: Add automated tests verifying analyzer and contrast helpers in both Node and Deno contexts.
